SENT.plain: A child with Kostmann syndrome, or severe congenital neutropenia, developed myelodysplastic syndrome after 6 years of treatment with rhG-CSF
The bone marrow karyotype showed acquired trisomy 21, and in some cells pentasomy 21 due to two isodicentric chromosomes 21
This is the second report of a patient with Kostmann syndrome and acquired trisomy 21
